content.text: LumiDocs is an AI-powered platform that simplifies regulatory compliance for medical device companies by:

listItems: Automating review of regulatory documents with fine-tuned AI models
Empower all employees to write high-quality and compliant documentation
Allow teams to collaborate by auto-generating tasks and implementation suggestions

content.text: LumiDocs is a simple software that will save you countless hours and financial ressources on automating your compliance efforts. Understanding the key concepts below will get you started

listItems: A Regulatory Framework (e.g., MDR or ISO 13485) is a structured collection of requirements manufacturers must or choose to comply with.
Frameworks are divided into sections (e.g., Device Description), groups (e.g., Intended Use), and requirements (e.g., Identify Training User Training Requirements).
This hierarchy provides a clear overview of where each requirement fits. Sign in and navigate to 'Regulatory Frameworks' to see the latest supported standards.

content.text: Coming Soon: Easily compare regulatory frameworks to identify gaps in compliance.

listItems: A Report is a selection of documents analyzed by fine-tuned AI agents to check compliance with a selected regulatory framework.
You can analyze thousands of documents across hundreds of requirements for ≈€1,500, which equates to ≈7 consultancy hours.
Sub-reports or smaller subsets can be run to minimize costs further and focus on specific areas of interest.

content.text: Coming Soon: Auto-reassess new implementations and export tasks to Jira/Trello.

listItems: Tasks are auto-generated after running a report. Each task is tied to specific findings to guide improvements effectively.
LumiDocs provides a Kanban board to filter tasks by user, locate tasks related to specific documents, and track implementation progress.

content.text: In Development: Integrate your QMS to automatically track changes in documents and update compliance assessments.

listItems: Files are currently supported as PDFs and Zip files exported from your QMS.
These files can be analyzed within LumiDocs to ensure compliance with regulatory frameworks.

content.text: In Development: AI-assisted document editor to auto-generate, test, and enhance regulatory documentation.
Get started today and reduce the time and effort required to achieve compliance.

listItems: Upload your documentation as searchable PDFs.
Select your regulatory framework, such as ISO 13485 or MDR.
Review a detailed compliance report and implement suggested improvements.
